title: 0.3.0 fails to build with "error: gloo/rendezvous/store.h: No such file or directory"
body_html:
/usr/bin/g++-4.9  -DWITH_CUDA=1 -DWITH_GLOO=1 -DWITH_MPI=1 -D_THD_CORE=1 -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/CUDA_SDK_ROOT_DIR-NOTFOUND/common/inc -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/include/openmpi -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/include/openmpi/opal/mca/event/libevent2022/libevent -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/include/openmpi/opal/mca/event/libevent2022/libevent/include -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/include -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include  -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include   -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC   -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS   -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1 -fexceptions  -std=c++11 -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -fPIC   -o CMakeFiles/THD.dir/process_group/General.cpp.o -c /home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/process_group/General.cpp
In file included from /home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/Store.cpp:1:0:
/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/Store.hpp:4:35: fatal error: gloo/rendezvous/store.h: No such file or directory
 #include "gloo/rendezvous/store.h"
                                   ^
compilation terminated.
In file included from /home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelGloo.cpp:1:0:
/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelGloo.hpp:7:35: fatal error: gloo/rendezvous/store.h: No such file or directory
 #include "gloo/rendezvous/store.h"
                                   ^
compilation terminated.
In file included from /home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/base/DataChannel.cpp:3:0:
/home/acecile/packaging/pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/debian/build/cuda-avx-sse42/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelGloo.hpp:7:35: fatal error: gloo/rendezvous/store.h: No such file or directory
 #include "gloo/rendezvous/store.h"
                                   ^
compilation terminated.
CMakeFiles/THD.dir/build.make:254: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/THD.dir/base/data_channels/Store.cpp.o' failed

I can provide testing and more logs if needed !

Regards, Adam.
